column5: Looking to take my wife ice fishing later this week for her birthday(new years eve actually). We are looking for a place that offers ice cabins, we want to stay one or two nights. We wouldn't mind catching some walleye or some pike.  Any suggestions as to where we should try?  I called a couple of places that I could find, but they were booked up already.  Thanks,  Mark

If you can't fins anyplace soon,, how about a room at the "As you like it" motel in Stratford... with a huge box of Rheo Thompson chocolates.  And then take a day trip north to the Auburn area for some ice fishing.
